remarks: Lemma for ~ c1lip1 .  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Nov-2014.)
statement:
c1liplem1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
c1liplem1.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
c1liplem1.le $e |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
c1liplem1.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( CC ^pm RR ) ) $.
c1liplem1.dv $e |- ( ph -> ( ( RR _D F ) |` ( A [,] B ) ) e. ( ( A [,] B ) -cn-> RR ) ) $.
c1liplem1.cn $e |- ( ph -> ( F |` ( A [,] B ) ) e. ( ( A [,] B ) -cn-> RR ) ) $.
c1liplem1.k $e |- K = sup ( ( abs " ( ( RR _D F ) " ( A [,] B ) ) ) , RR , < ) $.
c1liplem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( K e. RR /\ A. x e. ( A [,] B ) A. y e. ( A [,] B ) ( x < y -> ( abs ` ( ( F ` y ) - ( F ` x ) ) ) <_ ( K x. ( abs ` ( y - x ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d ph x y $.
